channel.title: Compiling with .bat files >.>
channel.description:
Hello.
For my bot, lets just say there is a file compile .bat, and I want it to compile classes in certain directories. This is what I have in it right now: [code]@echo off title Compiling Main Files... javac -cp runescape.jar BotFiles.*.java title Compiling Scripts... javac -cp runescape.jar Scripts.*.java pause[/code]
For some reason, it doesn't seem to work >.>
Can someone help me? Thanks! Oh and also, how can I make it so it doesn't just compile with runescape.jar, but also with some other folders/java files? THANKS!

Shit like dat yo.

item.title: Compiling with .bat files >.>
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

@echo off title Compiling Main Files... javac -cp runescape.jar BotFiles/*.java title Compiling Scripts... javac -cp runescape.jar Scripts/*.java pause
?

otherwise

@echo off title Compiling Main Files... javac -cp runescape.jar -sourcepath BotFiles -d BotFiles *.java title Compiling Scripts... javac -cp runescape.jar -sourcepath Scripts -d Scripts *.java pause
might have to edit ur classpath a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with .bat files >.>
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x

Hello.

For my bot, lets just say there is a file compile .bat, and I want it to compile classes in certain directories.
This is what I have in it right now:

For some reason, it doesn’t seem to work >.>

Can someone help me? Thanks! Oh and also, how can I make it so it doesn’t just compile with runescape.jar, but also with some other folders/java files? THANKS!
